DOC.brief_summary: This non-interventional study is conducted in Europe. The study is both retrospective and prospective. The purpose of the study is to assess the frequency of hypoglycaemia (low blood glucose) in insulin-treated patients with type 1 and type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: French Observational Survey to Assess Hypoglycaemia in Insulin-treated Diabetic Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients with Type 1 or Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Patients treated by insulin for at least 12 months Patients able to perform capillary selfmonitoring plasma glucose (SMPG) measurements Patients able to complete the questionnaires Patients who have accepted to participate to the survey (signature of an information notice) Patients with Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus not treated with insulin Females who are currently pregnant or lactating or who were pregnant during the previous year
